title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be a founding member of the new Special Cloud team, leading a team of 8+ and driving innovation in the next generation of autonomous cloud infrastructure for Microsoft's M365 Sovereign and Regulated cloud offerings. You will have the opportunity to make an impact at massive scale, with room for growth in discipline, team-building, and learning while working in foundational cloud technologies.
skills: A seasoned software engineer with extensive experience in managing highly complex software services at internet scale, collaborating across teams, and inspiring talented engineering talent. Proficient in cloud and related technologies for over 5 years, with a strong background in architecture, performance, scale, and backend development. Proven engineering management skills for over 2 years, with a degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
